DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study was to evaluate the effect of dehydroepiandrosterone supplementation on in vitro fertilization performance and outcome among poor-responder patient.
DOC.brief_title: Dehydroepiandrosterone Supplementation for Poor Responder Patients During in Vitro Fertilization Treatment
DOC.criteria: previous poor response to ovarian stimulation in IVF. patients over the age of 42 patients who received DHEA at any time.
